Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute at Hubbard/Milwaukee
ShortDescription: 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Halsted, Grand and Des Plaines due to, street blockage near Hubbard/Milwaukee.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

 

#56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Halsted, Grand, Des Plaines and over regular route, due to street blockage near Hubbard/Milwaukee.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Southbound Reroute near 130th/Ellis
ShortDescription: Southbound 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 131st, Ingleside, 132nd and Ellis due to, police activity near 130th/Ellis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 131st, Ingleside, 132nd and Ellis due to, police activity near 130th/Ellis.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th/Dan Ryan-bound Subway Trains Rerouted to Elevated Tracks
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are temporarily rerouted to the elevated tracks between Fullerton and Cermak due to track conditions near North/Clybourn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th/Dan Ryan-bound Red Line trains are temporarily rerouted to the elevated lines between Fullerton and Cermak-Chinatown due to track conditions near North/Clybourn.

Red Line service to 95th/Dan Ryan

After stopping at Fullerton, 95th-bound trains will be diverted and will make the following elevated station stops:

  • Armitage (accessible)
  • Sedgwick (accessible)
  • Chicago (at Franklin; accessible)
  • Merchandise Mart (accessible)
  • Clark/lake (accessible)
  • State/Lake
  • Washington/Wabash (accessible)
  • Adams/Wabash
  • Roosevelt (elevated station west of Wabash; accessible)

Then, trains will stop at Cermak-Chinatown and make all normal stops to 95th/Dan Ryan.

Connections can be made between Howard-bound subway service and 95th-bound rerouted service via elevated lines at Fullerton (accessible), State/Lake (board at nearby elevated station on Orange Line side for 95th-bound Red Line service) and at Roosevelt (accessible).

We apologize for the inconvenience and are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Howard-bound service is not affected.
